info.name: Sunbird CoKreat API - Form's for BGMS
info.description: This collection have all the form API's for new Domain configuration for framework catefories

item.name: Workspace
Workspace Category Show/ Hide Update API

item.description: These API's are to enable and disbale the primary category tiles in workspace, In case you have to show or hide any categories the "visible" key needs to be updated.

item.name: coKreat Form API for Framework Categories

    "request": {
